div.p: Our school buildings may be closed for the rest of the academic year and in-person teaching may have been stopped, but student learning opportunities continue and student services still are being provided.

Our COVID-19 landing page provides daily or weekly updates of our work – including our efforts to provide meals to students and our work to continue to engage students in academic and wellness pursuits.

Chesterfield County Public Schools has developed a continuity of instruction plan that will allow students to continue to be exposed to the scope of the curriculum initially laid out for them in September 2019. Our role now is to see that we continue to prepare students, to the best of our ability, for success in the 2020-21 academic year.
We encourage you to visit our COVID-19 page to learn more about the support available to keep our students’ minds and bodies engaged and active.
